Reflect on your own strengths: Instead of focusing on the accomplishments of others, take a moment to reflect on your own strengths and what you have achieved. This can help you to feel more confident and motivated in your own abilities.

Practice gratitude: Instead of comparing yourself to others, try practicing gratitude for what you have in your own life. This can help you to shift your focus away from what others are doing and towards the positive aspects of your own life.

Take a break: If you're feeling overwhelmed by jealousy, it may be helpful to take a break from the situation. Take a walk, listen to music, or engage in another activity that helps you to relax and clear your mind.
Seek support: Talk to a trusted friend or family member about your feelings of jealousy. Sometimes, just talking to someone can help you to process your emotions and gain a new perspective.
Set realistic goals: Instead of comparing yourself to others, set realistic goals for yourself. This can help you to focus on your own progress and feel more motivated to achieve your goals.
